title: Inside Europe 18.08.2022
description: Climate special: the European Space Agency tracks terrestrial changes from space, drought in the UK, France’s nuclear conundrum and the race to contain Europe's wildfires. Also: DW's On the Green Fence podcast takes an in-depth look at the aviation industry’s contributions to climate change.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: climate, wildfires, Drought, nuclear, Kate Laycock, Inside Europe, European Space Agency (ESA)
